title: Cruisin' Series - A History of Rock 'n' Roll Radio - 1958, 1960,
description:
This Collection isn't just music......it's history

The word cruisin' doesn't appear in the dictionary, but it's a familiar word to millions of people who did it.. 

Each album is not just a collection of the top pop music of a particular year but a total recreation by a top disc jockey (of that year) doing his original program over a major pop music station. That means actual commercials, promotional jingles, sound effects, newscast simulations and even record hop announcements in addition to the original records themselves. 

Included here are:
 1958 with DJ Jack Carney of WIL Radio in St. Louis, MO
 1960 with DJ Dick Biondi of WKBW Radio in Buffalo, NY
 1962 with DJ Russ "Weird Beard" Knight KLIF Radio in Dallas, TX
 1965 with DJ Robert W. Morgan of KHJ Radio in Los Angeles, CA
 1966 with DJ Patrick O'Day of DJ KJR in Seattle, WA
